short_summary: Request for Standing Offer for Boxed Lunches, Period 03
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on January 4, 2024. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This procurement is for the acquisition of boxed lunches located in Quebec, as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
================ Tue, 26 Dec 2023

* Gibbs-Ramanujan MVC-023PPRQ: Open and Inclusive - Boxed Lunches - Period 03*
* Gibbs-Ramanujan MVC-023PPRQ: Open and Inclusive - Boxed Lunches - Période 03*

**RFP ID Number:** #WS3954769898-Doc4327046554
**Latest Amendment:** 1
**Publication Date:** Tuesday, 27 November 2023
**Proposal Submission Deadline:** Wednesday, 10 January 2024 (14:00 HAE)

This tender is now closed to new bidders. See details below.

**Contract Summary**
--------------------

FPWS is sought for the purchase of packaged combination meals (Category 50192700) located in Quebec, with the intent to establish a standing offer. The contract is expected to commence on a date to be determined and conclude on 31 May 2024.

**Notice Type**
-------------

The Government of Canada invites proposals for a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) pursuant to a competitive contract Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) under the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement.

**Selection Criteria**
---------------------

The bid winning selection process will be based on the lowest price offered.

**Post-Submission Information**
-----------------------------

February 2024 (TBD, EXACT DATE TBD)
Original submissions and any addenda response must be submitted no later than the established closing date (Wednesday, 10 January 2024 14:00 HAE) to be considered for evaluation.

**Agency Contact:**

For inquiries, please contact Stephane Dube, available at (stephane.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Documents RPC**
-----------------

All the relevant information and documentation should be requested at the specified URL (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18120623?extsite=MTgxMjA2MjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
